Get ready for the winter trends 2025‚Äì26 that every stylish man needs to know. From leather jackets making a major comeback to layering essentials, textured knits, and b

transcript.text: All the winter fashion trends of this year are in today's video.

What's up, bro? Welcome or welcome back to Be Your Best, India's coolest self-improvement channel where I, Sankalra, upload two videos a week on fashion, skincare, hair, grooming, personality and self-improvement. So, let's start.
First of all, after watching fashion shows, I feel that biker core is going to be popular.
Whether it's a leather jacket mainly or biker pants or boots, gloves, any type of protective gear.
Because this time, there were a lot of masculine things in Margiela in fashion shows.
Pharrell wore a lot of biker jackets in Louis Vuitton as well.
And I felt a lot of BDSM from the biker core of D-square.
Tom Ford also did the biker core in a very chic way, I mean, a little fashionable.
And the show of Y3 is my favorite.
The second trend, I think, army print or military style is going to come back.
Now, I am not relating it to any country's war or military coup.
But CDG, that is, Comte de Garcon, did a rally of anti-war type this time in the show.
And Louis Vuitton did military but it was a little floral camo type and it was a soft vibe.
Now, Armani made a cyber-military tech wear.
And Kid Super, as always, played very well with patchwork.
But its simplest form is going to be that you are going to buy a military print pants this time.
Now, where to buy it cheaply, I will find it and give it to you.
So, that video is going to come, subscribe to it and turn on the notifications.
Next, retro things are going to be popular.
Because in Fendi's show, a lot of 40s and 50s retro things were included this time.
In Gucci's show, there was a lot of 60s and 90s glam type.
In St. Laurent, there was a lot of 80s tailoring, there were boots too.
Ameeri made an old Hollywood type thing.
And Calvin Klein's show also had a 90s minimalism.
And by the way, I have noticed another trend in this time's show, leather suits.
Very sharp tailoring but with rugged leather.
Like it was shown in Prada in a very strange way.
In Margiela, there were very glossy things.
I just liked the double-breasted 70s-80s style in Burberry.
Next, I saw another trend of fur and shirling.
Now, I feel that this trend is coming back because of thrift shopping.
Because there was shirling in Prada too.
There were fur coats in Dolce & Gabbana.
There was fur in Fendi too.
There was a lot of fur in Gucci and Rick Owens too.
But I feel that in India, maximum people will buy fur things in thrift shopping, by going to Sarojini.
And if you want a thrift shopping video from Sarojini, then please like this video.
Increase this video in our algorithm.
So, that video will get 10,000 likes.
Next, I noticed another trend, thin scarves.
Which are inspired by very old retro styles.
And they add a little softness to your tailoring and outerwear.
Next, I saw another trend, power coats.
Very wide shoulders, just like the villains in movies.
Very much strength, confidence and similar provider feel.
Balenciaga, Ferragamo, Versace and Prada, this was in all of them.
And it was looking very rich in all of them.
Next, a very amazing trend that is going to come is Normcore.
This is for those who have an anti-fashion mindset.
Who want to dress like an NPC.
Because there is no need to always stand out.
Even I like to wear basic clothes.
I wear amazing clothes, but I wear basic clothes.
Like I make Urban Eats.
And I blend in.
I blend in inside.
I don't look different.
Like in Balenciaga, this time I was seeing very standard clothes.
And Prada, Dolce & Gabbana, Hermes, all of them did everyday looks.
I can see that everyone is learning from Urban Eats.
Next, one more trend that was trending last time, is not going anywhere this time.
It is going to trend here, that is neckties.
Which is now in a formal, versatile, everyday style.
Take Balenciaga, Gucci.
Even in Valentino, the style of the tie is different everywhere.
Next, a fabric that I saw will trend a lot this time, at least it was in the shows, is tweed.
This is a very traditional type of fabric.
And opposite of new age fashion.
So this time it was in Diesel, Gucci, LV, and even Dior.
Now if you want me to stitch a tweed material suit and show you, then I will post it on Instagram.
I had already planned this.
So you can follow me on Instagram.
There are amazing suits and other trendy outfits.
Anyway, the next trend that I saw is to use belts as a statement.
I mean, this functional thing has been taken a little too experimental.
Whether it is Dolce & Gabbana, Bali, or even Coach.
I will say, just buy a basic, good buckle belt.
I will find you on Amazon and suggest good things in upcoming videos.
And the next trend that I saw is loungewear.
See, everyone is learning from Urban Eats.
Because now the time has come that comfort has become a luxury.
And opposite to this, at the end of the spectrum, the thing is that fashionable things have become cheap. You get very cool things for 100 rupees.
So assume that the basics, the comfortable things are becoming more expensive.
So both sides are going.
And we saw this in Prada, Valentino, Dolce & Gabbana.
And Balenciaga's Puma.
The next trend that I saw is riding boots.
Now this is a very masculine thing according to me.
And sub-brands have paired them with different things.
Like D-squared or Ceylon.
And I have seen that it will look best with relaxed fit trousers.
And if you want to buy it, then I think in India, only Zara will make some cool ones.
Now I can also suggest you more such trends here.
Like nowadays, using keychain as an accessory by putting it on the loop of your belt is trending a lot.
But it is very niche.
So I will tell you very versatile trends on YouTube.
I will do all that nonsense on Instagram.
So let's go to the next set of trends.
Tell me in the comments below, which trend are you most excited for?
Or which trend are you hating the most?
But anyway, this time I know for sure that brown color is going to burst again.
And I think people will start wearing brown instead of black.
I mean, all this had started coming last year, honestly.
And that's why the research I did on colors, on fashion colors,
I came to know that this time I have to restock chocolate color in hoodies.
I have to restock more shades of brown, whether it is brown espresso.
And I personally honestly think that brown color looks very good on all skin tones and looks premium.
And before going to the next trend, I just want to tell you this.
If you are still making this mistake, then please stop wearing slim fit or skinny jeans.
If you find baggy fit very overwhelming, that it's not so baggy, it's not so fashionable, then wear straight fit.
But anyway, the next trend, which I think is only going to come, is that people will start styling thermals properly.
I mean, the inner you wear is warmer.
I have all the level thermals of Uniqlo, which is the layer to be worn inside.
There is a waffle one in it.
It looks retro from inside.
You look like a 90s kid.
And look, it's good practically, it will also look cool.
I don't know whether this trend will trend or not, but I started seeing a lot on Instagram that that Henley shirt is coming back, but I don't know.
But the next trend, which is Sweater West, which has been trying to come for the last 2 years,
I think this time it will hit the mainstream.
A lot of people, I think, at least in tier 1 cities, like Delhi, Mumbai, it's not so cold in Mumbai. In Delhi, you will see people wearing Sweater West.
So, I think you can steal this from your dad, if your dad is older, or from your grandparents.
You can take this, you will definitely get it on Zara.
I will tell you to buy their old cut-sleeve sweater from someone who is older than you.
But yes, obviously, it should be a relaxed fit.
And similarly, I think this time, some people will start wearing cardigans as well.
But I think in this, you will either look very mature, or you will look very feminine.
So, this trend is not for me.
Next, I saw, I was scrolling on Instagram, I saw a beanie of Arc'teryx.
It will probably do a lot of trend of that type this time.
Because it doesn't have a cuff.
But I don't know, there were some abuses and praises in his comments, so I don't know what will happen.
Next, definitely, which is going to be a bursting trend this time, is baggy fit or wide fit sweatpants.
And I got to know this only last year, that's when I started working on these things.
Because this time, I am seeing everywhere, people are wearing sweatpants with boots.
They are styling it in different ways.
And some people are wearing it in smart type outfits.
Now, the best thing is, it is comfortable as well.
So, if your sweatpants are looking smart, then you can wear it outside.
Think of comfort, bro.
And I swear on my parents, no one is giving you sweatpants better than Urban Meet.
I make the best.
So, these were all the trends that I noticed on Instagram, TikTok, Pinterest, YouTube, fashion shows everywhere.
But apart from this, I think, bootcut jeans are going to come from Punjab to other places as well.
Or, I have heard that slim jeans are going to come back.
I am not going to wear slim jeans this year.
If I wear, then I will wear it by next year.
I didn't understand anything special about sneakers.
I think chunky sneakers are going now.
So, get ready for our winter shopping videos.
Look your best, feel your best and be your best.
